title: Maps for a changing world. - 2nd edition.
brief_description: This film demonstrates how latitude and longitude can be used to locate places on the earth surface regardless of what map projection is used. It also shows how abstract symbols help in the location and interpretation of natural and man-made features and how thematic maps are used to illustrate information features such as population.
